Charmander.name: Charmander
Charmander.description: It has a preference for hot things. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.

Squirtle.name: Squirtle
Squirtle.description: When it retracts its long neck into its shell, it squirts out water with vigorous force.

Bulbasaur.name: Bulbasaur
Bulbasaur.description: There is a plant seed on its back right from the day this Pok√©mon is born. The seed slowly grows larger.
